TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A vaccine made of antigens and dendritic antigen-presenting cells (APCs).

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "dendritic cell vaccine"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "vacuna de células dendríticas"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Vacuna compuesta por antígenos y células dendríticas presentadoras de antígeno (CPA).
